mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_log ( login_log_id, user_id, user_key, user_name, user_name_ch, ip_address, login_time ) VALUES ( #{userLoginId}, #{userId}, #{userKey}, #{userName}, #{userNameCh}, #{ipAddress}, #{loginTime} )

INSERT INTO operate_log ( user_id, user_key, user_name, user_name_ch, ip_address, create_date, description, package, clazz, method, params, type, use_time, exception_code, exception_detail ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userKey}, #{userName}, #{userNameCh}, #{ipAddress}, #{createDate}, #{description}, #{packageName}, #{clazz}, #{method}, #{params}, #{type}, #{useTime}, #{exceptionCode}, #{exceptionDetail} )
